value.name: Epoch Times defiant after Hong Kong printing press attacked
value.description: "Police received a report saying that the suspects ... In 2014 former Ming Pao newspaper editor Kevin Lau was nearly killed in a machete attack by two men who said they were paid to "teach Lau ...

value.name: Louisiana police say officers shot, killed man with gun
value.description: Lake Charles Deputy Chief Mark Kraus says 44-year-old Kevin Lau, an Asian-American, died at a hospital. Kraus says Chief Donald Dixon has asked Louisiana State Police to investigate the shooting.
